import "./PostCard.css" import {ChatBubbleOutline, FavoriteBorder, Share, BookmarkBorder, MoreVert, SentimentSatisfiedAlt} from "@mui/icons-material"; const PostCard = ({post}) => { return (

Google

{post.likes.length} likes

username

{post.desc}

2 minutes ago

) } export default PostCard
